name: Ambulance Simulator 2017 - 911 rescue driving 3D
description:
*Emergency rescue ambulance 3d simulator-Drive fast and safe to take patients to hospital*
Don’t be Careless, drive cautiously as citizens’ life depends on your dynamic and precision driving skills.
It’s crucial time you have to save lives of loved ones in emergency medical rescue mission that are injured seriously in road accident and their vehicles are crash due traffic collicions. It has been a massive accident in the Modern big city and you’re the one of the hospital emergency staff member, rescue them by driving city ambulance! Drive ambulance fast but with highly precision to avoid city traffic accidents, you need to be fast and energetic to find the disaster spot and find parking spot for carrying deadly injured people. Turn on the sirens and throttle to get the way from heavy traffic vehicles. Take injured patients on stretcher for hospital treatment. It would be very important and crucial Rescue mission of its own kind in which you have to perform thrilling and amazing Tasks to rescue injured People. You are the frontline doctor and your duty is very tough when lives are in danger and as a dr. you should be available 24/7 in city hospital.
“Time and efficiency are the key points that matters most to rescue the injured people”.
Emergency rescue ambulance driver 3d simulator is an outstanding and one of the best ambulance rescue simulator games in simulation world, which is full of challenging Rescue missions. It's a real simulation for emergency driving school for ambulance drivers.
Saving one life means saving the entire humanity!!! So, Drive Fast to save lives.

Emergency rescue ambulance 3d simulator Features:
• 3D Ambulance Vehicle
• Realistic Physics
• 15 challenging Rescue missions
• Stunning 3D graphics
• Best ambulance simulator racer
• Heavy Traffic and busy City Roads
• Heavy duty tires drifting
• Multi routes environment
• Smooth and easy controls
• User friendly
• Realistic human characters
• Addictive gameplay

So don't waste your time just download this ambulance rescue driving game and save the precious lives by driving faster.
